page.title: 19Knolleys Nursery, Cheshunt
page.content: The nursery we visited was called Knolleys.The nursery first opened in the 1920's.The people in the nursery grow flowers.They grow one quarter of a million flowers a year.They sell most of them at Covent Garden.They do not grow any tomatoes because they are difficult to grow in the nursery.They heat the glass houses by using oil.It costs 10,000 pounds to heat the glass houses every year. The people in the nursery stopped the glass blowing out by painting all of the windows in the nursery.Many glass houses have gone out of business because the cost of running them is far too high for the people to pay. As a result, the land was sold, the glasshouses knocked down, and housing estates built.
